Try demo: Try it in a demo house

manager.bio: I have more than 15 years of experience in house-management.
manager.message: As Manager of Demo House I welcome you in our honline system.

0.title: Problem with the front door
0.text: Someone broke in the front door last week, it cannot be locked ever since

comment.0: Yes, I've already reported the problem. Earliest they can come fix it is next week.

1.title: Bank loan for renovation
1.text: There is special offer from the bank for a one time loan that can be used for renovation.

comment.0: I think it is worth it. Interest is only 6%, repayment period is 10 years.
comment.1: Well, I'm not sure. We just got out from our last loan. Finally we can make the common cost lower, and now another loan?

2.title: Loud dog on the 4th floor
2.text: There is a dog on the 4th crying all day. The owner should not leave it alone all day.

comment.1: I apologize from everyone. The dog is ours, it ususally doesn't make any noise. But my granny was in the hospital, and it was left alone last week.
comment.2: Fortunately granny is out of hospital and back home from yesterday, so it won't be causing noise anymore. Sincere apologies from everyone.

0.title: Garbage Day on next Friday
0.text: Any dangerous materials and special garbage can be placed outside the front door on the previous day. And it will be taken away

1.title: Mandatory chimney checking
1.text:
Has to be done until the end of the month.
Please choose an appropriate date and schedule an appointment with the chimney checkers at +36(20)2569875.

0.title: Bank loan for renovation
0.text: We shall take a $100,000 special loan from the bank at 6% interest, repaying through the next 10 years.

1.title: Guest parking lots
text: The parking lots for the guests of the house are used by other people, we should limit its use.
Proposed resolution: Let's establish telescopic parking guards in the two guest parking lots of the house, total cost is 46,200.- HUF. Each owner will get a key.

2.title: Cleaning in winter
2.text: As winter is here, the staircase is getting more dirty. I suggest increasing the regularity of the cleaning of the staircase to twice a week.

3.title: Bicycle storage
text: There is no safe storage for bicyles in the house. It would be advisable to construct a 12-seater storage on the garage level. In case of acceptance we will ask for 3 offers.

Proposed resolution: The house shall establish a bicycle storage from a maximum gross amount of 200,000 HUF on the garage level. The Manager is responsible for the request of offers and the execution. Deadline: 15/08/2018.

4.title: Color of the building walls
4.text: What color should we paint the building's walls during the renovation in August.

comment.0: Light colors are always prefered. Makes the area look brighter.
comment.1: OMG If you choose grey, I'm moving out!

5.title: Replacement of Manager
5.text: Let's have a vote in writing or hold an extraordinary meeting for this purpose. Those who agree to replace the manager, please support this proposal. If at least 10% of the ownership ratios support this proposal the current manager is obliged to open a vote on this issue. If he fail to do this within 30 days of the successful completion of this vote, the Audit Board shall do the same.

0.title: Elevator out of order
0.text: Stopped on the 6th floor. None of the buttons make it move.

1.title: My bathroom is being flooded from above.
1.text: A part of the ceiling has even fallen. I was lucky to not have my bath at that moment. I could be dead now.

2.title: Electricity shortages
2.text: It is the third time that the electricity goes away for a period during the nigth.

comment.0: I reported to the electricity company last week. They are looking into it.

3.title: Cracks in the wall
3.text: On the second floor the wall is cracked, pieces of it fallen down.

messages.0: Hi! I've found your post box keys. You've left it in the post box. :)
messages.1: Ooops. Thanks a lot! I was looking for it, thought I lost it. I'll drop by to pick it up after dinner.
